question:
You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.
You have lost your student identification card. This has created some problems for you.
Write a letter to the director of student services. In your letter
•	advise them of your situation
•	explain how this is affecting you
•	request a new card
You do NOT need to write any addresses. Begin your letter as follows:
Dear
 
You should write at least 150 words.
text: I am writing you this letter to request a new ID card because I have lost mine last Wednesday while I was in the way to the college by a taxi.

I have faced many problems because of my lost ID card. The security at the gate of the college refused to get me in, however I showed them my lectures’ timetable and my friends told them that I am a student in the language department. However, they did not change the rules. As a result, unfortunately, I could not hand my assignment for phonetics class. For sure I lose marks in this subject. In addition to that, on Thursday night I could not register on the linguistics class, which negatively effect on my studying. I have to wait for the next month to apply.
I really suggest putting an announcement on the wallboard to advise the other students to take a good care of their ID cards to prevent themselves from several troubles.
I am looking forward to hear from you soon.
